RENEWABLE ENERGY

Solar Energy Installation

6 months
Next Intake: Jan 2026
Back to Programs

Program Overview

Comprehensive training in solar PV systems, from basic electrical theory to advanced installation and troubleshooting. Students learn to design, install, and maintain residential and commercial solar systems.

What to Expect

Hands-on workshops, site visits to active solar installations, and safety certification training. You will work with industry-standard tools and equipment.

Career Prospects & Startup Path

Future Opportunities

Solar technician, system designer, energy consultant, or renewable energy entrepreneur. Graduates often start their own installation companies or work for major energy providers.

Program Details

Duration

6 months

Certification

National TVET Certificate

Schedule

Full-time (Mon-Fri)

Location

Main Campus, Banjul
